data.title: The Golden Harvest

data.text:
A delightful insight into what can make the mundane magical, Yunis’ award-winning documentary is a gold-tinged masterpiece.

-Virginia Film Festival

Visit our website and check out the trailer and more: http://www.goldenharvestfilm.org/

If it were a woman, olive tree would be the Mediterranean’s Scheherazade, the great storyteller. Through hundreds of wars, Biblical times, and the current migrant crisis it has been steadfast, seeping into the culture, economics, history, politics, religion and food in this 6,000-year love story.
